description: Up mountains. Down Streets. Decade will keep you covered in all seasons. Versatile warmth that is just as comfortable after a long day up the mountain as it is in airports and rolling through town. Merino Fleece is durable and keeps you super warm, DWR recycled ripstop panels add extra protection where needed and zipped pockets will keep your bits and pieces secure while you’re on the move.
name: Mons Royale Decade Merino Fleece Pants - Mens

specs.value: Merino Fleece - 59% Recycled Polyester 36% Merino Wool 5% Elastane
